name: Initial Reactions Trivia Quiz | Initials | 20 Questions

questions.text: This A.A. starred in, among many other movies, 'The Russians Are Coming! The Russians Are Coming!'
questions.explanation:
Alan Arkin.

	Alan Alda (actor, 'MASH'), Anthony Andrews (actor, 'Brideshead Revisited'), Arthur Ashe (tennis player).

questions.text: This M.M. is a noted American anthropologist.
questions.explanation:
Margaret Mead.

	Melba Moore (singer) ; Marie McDonald (actress, 'It Started With Eve'), Mae Marsh (actress, 'Birth of a Nation').

questions.text: This F.F. wrote the suspense thriller, 'The Day of the Jackal'.
questions.explanation:
Frederick Forsyth.

	F.Scott Fitzgerald (Novelist, 'The Great Gatsby'), Francisco Franco (Dictator of Spain), Frederico Fellini (Italian director).

questions.text: This C.S. was married to James Taylor?
questions.explanation:

questions.text: This J.K. is a 'Beat Generation' author and poet?

questions.text: This M.L. was the actress who starred in the 'Thin Man' movies.

questions.text: This W.W. is the American poet who wrote 'Leaves of Grass'.
questions.explanation:
